story_teamflare_02_06000/2401_1001_0200_:
What are you planning? How many others are
with you?
story_teamflare_02_06000/2401_1001_0400_:
Is there any way we can get some information out
of them?
story_teamflare_02_06000/2401_1001_0600_:
Do you think you can help us out with
your power?
story_teamflare_02_06000/2401_1001_0800_: Information is flowing into my head!
story_teamflare_02_06000/2401_1001_0900_: Team Rocket is infiltrating Team Flare as spies...
story_teamflare_02_06000/2401_1001_1000_:
And they were trying to steal information about
the weapon to gain pure destructive power.
story_teamflare_02_06000/2401_1001_1100_:
Also, by doing bad deeds while disguised as
Team Flare...
story_teamflare_02_06000/2401_1001_1200_:
they wanted to make a situation where Lysandre,
who was keeping a low profile, would have no
choice but to act.
story_teamflare_02_06000/2401_1001_1300_:
And the location of the headquarters is...
I see...
story_teamflare_02_06000/2401_1001_1400_:
Thank you for so kindly telling us your identity,
mission, and headquarters’ location.
story_teamflare_02_06000/2401_1001_1600_: H-how?! How did you find out?
story_teamflare_02_06000/2401_1001_1900_:
So it was you folks again! You’re the ones who
were behind all of this!
